ygData.subject: Knok and Skar

Subject: Knok and Skar

OOC: These are two mini bots with only bot and engine modes.

The three pods land side by side on a small ocean cliff in Norway.  The two 
small ones on the side open to reveal two small bots.  One is pure goodness 
the other is pure evil.  Knok, the good bot, takes the first swing at the 
evil Skar.  Skar easily dodges and backhands him off a the cliff.  He turns 
to the third pod and opens it revealing a large bot.  It is basically a 
blank.  It cannot move without either Knok or Skar.  It does have it's own 
name though, Blaise.  Skar laughs maniacally and hops onto Blaise's chest 
plate.  He leans down to inspect an opening.  Seeing that the opening is 
clear he steps into the hole and transforms into an engine gaining control of 
Blaise.

::SkarBlaise::
    He picks himself up and inspects his body it is a metallic green.  A nice 
color he thinks to himself.  He steps out of the pod and reaches back for his 
gun.  It is in two parts.  The first is a small rocket launcher and the 
second is a small laser canon.  Satisfied he transforms into his tank mode 
tossing his guns up the fuse to form one big missile that is mounted on his 
back where a tank's gun would normally be.  This done he recalls a map of 
Earth he was given.  Seeing no easy way south he heads east.
